channel.title: 1. The Online Boutique on Splunk Observability Cloud Workshops
channel.description: Recent content in 1. The Online Boutique on Splunk Observability Cloud Workshops

item.title: 1.1 Generate load
item.description: 5 minutes 1. Generate traffic The Online Boutique deployment contains a container running Locust that we can use to generate load traffic against the website to generate metrics, traces and spans. Ninja - Access your Locust instance Locust is available on port 82 of the EC2 instance’s IP address. Open a new tab in your web browser and go to http://<ec2-ip-address>:82/, you will then be able to see the Locust running.
